task.title: How to Configure MarkLogic Data Source Drivers

prereq.p: Available in the Enterprise edition only. supports MarkLogic version 4.0 or later.

context.p: To configure a data source for MarkLogic, follow this procedure:

step.cmd: Select MarkLogic from the driver Type drop-down list.
Click the Add button to add the MarkLogic driver file ( marklogic-xcc-{server_version}, where {server_version} is the MarkLogic server version.)

info.p: You can download the driver file from: .

step.cmd: Continue on to configure your MarkLogic Connection.
